Name: Ginger Frost
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. SHAKE again with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Freshly squeezed lemon and orange juices, spiced with ginger and laced with vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of Ginger Frost contains 215 calories
